title: Automatic links (like for detected phone numbers) need to be stylable
body: Currently the links Edge creates for automatically detected phone numbers cannot be styled as far as I know. This means they look bad and out-of-place in websites, and many site owners would opt to disabling the feature on their site altogether which would hurt users.

comments.body: I think <meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no"> is what you are looking for.
